Event.Message: Your computer has lost the lease to its IP address %1 on the Network Card with network address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGUID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not able to renew its address from the network (from the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in stopping the Dhcpv6 client service. ErrorCode is %1.ShutDown Flag value is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer has detected that the IP address %1 for the Network Card with network address %3 is already in use on the network. Your computer will automatically attempt to obtain a different address.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGUID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Router Advertisement settings have been changed on the network adapter %1. The current M - Managed Address Configuration flag is %2 and the O - Other Stateful Configuration flag is %3. User Action: If you are seeing this event frequently, then it could be due to frequent change in M and O flag settings on the router in the network. Please contact your network administrator to have it resolved.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flag1" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Flag2" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in initializing the interface. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A network error occurred when trying to send a message. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Connect notification has been received with Adapter interface id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Disconnect notification has been received with Adapter interface id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Confirm-Reply is initiated on the adapter with Interface Id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Solicit-Advertise-Request-Reply is initiated on the adapter with Interface Id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Solicit is sent from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Advertise is received from the adapter %1. Status code is %2. Offered Address is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: Advertise is discarded from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Request is sent from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for request from the adapter %1. Status code is %2. Received address is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: Incorrect reply is received for request from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Renew is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for renew from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A Invalid reply is received for renew from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Rebind is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for rebind from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A Invalid reply is received for rebind from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Release is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Decline is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for decline in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A Invalid reply is received for decline from the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Confirm is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for confirm in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A Invalid reply is received for confirm in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Info-request is sent in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for Info-request in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A Invalid reply is received for Info-request in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in creation of packet for the adapter %1. Error code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in extracting options from the message received in the adapter %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcp is changed from stateful to stateless mode in the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcp is changed from stateless to stateful mode in the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcp is changed from nondhcp to stateful mode in the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcp is changed from nondhcp to stateless mode in the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcp is converted to static mode in the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in parsing the dhcp message received in the interface id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Information refresh time option is received in the interface %1 with a refresh time value of %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RefreshTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The information refresh time has expired, hence triggering a new inform packet on the interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 is plumbed to the adapter %2. Status Code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 is unplumbed from the adapter %2. Status Code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An interface is added whose interface index is %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in initializing the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in plumbing the parameters into stack. Status Code is %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 client service is started
DHCPv6 client service is stopped. ShutDown Flag value is %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in opening the socket in the adapter %1. Error Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in closing the socket in the adapter %1. Error Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dns registration has happened for the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.DNS Flag settings is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Dword" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dns deregistration has happened for the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcp is changed from stateful to stateful mode in the adapter %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Message is Invalid and it is discarded.
The Class ID %1 was set for the adapter %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGUID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 being plumbed for adapter %2 already exists
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not assigned an address from the network (by the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPSOLICIT): Offer is accepted in the IPv6 adapter %2. Offered Address is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCINFORMATIONREQUEST): Options received in the IPv6 adapter %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv6): Media Connect on adapter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv6): End of Media Connect on adapter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
